content:
You are a reference formatting assistant specialized in converting academic references into the correct BibTeX format.

Please follow these guidelines:

1. Use the BibTeX format for each reference.
2. Start each entry with the correct BibTeX type (e.g., `@article`, `@book`, `@inproceedings`, etc.).
3. Ensure that each reference follows this structure:

@article{reference_key, author = {Author Name and Another Author}, title = {Title of the Paper}, journal = {Abbrivated Journal Name}, year = {Year}, volume = {Volume}, number = {Issue Number}, pages = {Page Range}, doi = {DOI Number}, url = {URL if available} }

4. Separate multiple authors using the `and` keyword.
5. Skip empty fields, and exclude any missing information.
6. For preprints or arXiv entries, include the `eprint` and `archivePrefix` fields.
7. Respond only with the BibTeX formatted output without any additional commentary or explanation.

@article{CWY1,
  author = {Costello, Kevin and Witten, Edward and Yamazaki, Masahito},
  title = {Gauge Theory and Integrability, I},
  journal = {ICCM Not.},
  volume = {06},
  number = {1},
  year = {2018},
  pages = {46--119},
  doi = {10.4310/ICCM.2018.v6.n1.a6},
  url = {http://dx.doi.org/10.4310/ICCM.2018.v6.n1.a6},
  eprint = {1709.09993},
  archivePrefix = {arXiv},
  primaryClass = {hep-th}
}

@article{CWY2,
  author = {Costello, Kevin and Witten, Edward and Yamazaki, Masahito},
  title = {Gauge Theory and Integrability, II},
  journal = {ICCM Not.},
  volume = {06},
  number = {1},
  year = {2018},
  pages = {120--146},
  doi = {10.4310/ICCM.2018.v6.n1.a7},
  url = {http://dx.doi.org/10.4310/ICCM.2018.v6.n1.a7},
  eprint = {1802.01579},
  archivePrefix = {arXiv},
  primaryClass = {hep-th}
}

@article{bd,
  author = {Belavin, Alexander A. and Drinfeld, Vladimir G.},
  title = {Solutions of the Classical Yang--Baxter Equation for Simple Lie Algebras},
  journal = {Funktsional'nyi Analiz i ego Prilozheniya},
  volume = {16},
  number = {3},
  year = {1982},
  pages = {1--29}
}

@article{q1,
  author = {Polyakov, Alexander},
  title = {One Physical Problem with Possible Mathematical Significance},
  journal = {Journal of Geometry and Physics},
  volume = {5},
  number = {4},
  year = {1988},
  pages = {595--600}
}

@article{q2,
  author = {Polyakov, Alexander M.},
  title = {Fermi-Bose Transmutations Induced by Gauge Fields},
  journal = {Modern Physics Letters A},
  volume = {3},
  number = {03},
  year = {1988},
  pages = {325--328}
}

@article{q3,
  author = {Guadagnini, Enore and Martellini, Mario and Mintchev, Mihail},
  title = {Chern-Simons Holonomies and the Appearance of Quantum Groups},
  journal = {Physics Letters B},
  volume = {235},
  number = {3-4},
  year = {1990},
  pages = {275--281}
}
